module.name: product_occurrence
module.keywords: module, product occurrence, part occurrence, quantified occurrence, function occurrence
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the characterization of occurrences in a product structure, of objects represented with the entity Product and its subtypes.

inscope.li: identification of the occurrence of a product version in a product structure;
relationship of the occurrence of a product version with the definition of this product version it is derived from;
characterization of a product occurrence that is defined from a product specification;
characterization of the quantity of a product occurrence;
identification of the occurrence of a function;
specialization of the concept of product occurrence to represent occurrences of a part.

outscope.li: relationships with the functions or alternative solutions that a product occurrence provides a solution element for;
description of the use case of a part occurrence in a product family.
